title: How many times can I try the screen unlock pattern before my phone becomes permanently locked? Can I unlock the phone by sending an email from my Gmail?
answer:
Your phone will not be permanently locked even if you draw the unlock pattern for several consecutive times but the time at which you can try it again is delayed. 

 [If you forget your unlock pattern, send your phone to the local customer service center or flash your phone. Your phone cannot be unlocked using an email from Gmail. ]()
